title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Hanging " Birth of Round"", 1968–69
medium: Graphite, red and green color pencil on heavy cream paper
inscribed:
Inscribed in graphite on left half of sheet, upper left:  mathematical notations, BIRTH OF ROUND [turned sideways]/use silk with pick up stich/warp on table loom behind big loom; at center: warp linen/12 per inch/Reed 6 [...]/sley 2 in one/make silk warp separate/wind? on weight beam/on little loom./Resthread (sic) when needed/silk 18 per inch (not threaded)/sley 3 in one/width 20" for linen/[width] 8 1/2" silk/length 4 yd. for linen/3 yd 24 " [for] silk; at lower left:  20" [above double arrow sign indicating width] linen 240 thr./silk in 1 (encircled) 7"/[silk] 2 (encircled) 8 1/2"/[silk] 3 (encircled) 6"/[silk] 4 (encircled) 3"/mabre silk 8 1/2", move when necessary 153 thr./1 (encircled) 10 1/2 linen 8 1/2 silk + linen 1 linen/2 (encircled) same resley silk./3 (encircled) 8 1/2 linen 8 1/2 silk + linen 3 linen
4 (encircled) ditto; along right edge of sheet, upper right: mathematical notations; at center: shift fabric to left (crossed out); in green pencil: let warp show; in graphite, lower right: add 3" warp/original darkest of whole [...]
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: On recto, right side of sheet, horizontal image [to be read by turning sheet horizontally] of three-panel hanging.  Each panel is numbered and shows irregular shapes on red grid.  On left side, notes for weaver (see Inscriptions).  On verso, eight sketches of tree bark patterns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Hanging " Birth of Round"", 1968–69.
1968–69. Graphite, red and green color pencil on heavy cream paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-58.
